string.value: You delivered a glass of warm milk to #b#p1052106##k. Hope he can go to bed early from now on. You should tell #b#p9220005##k in Happyville about this delivery, as he was worried.
You told Dalphs#b#p9220005##k that the glass of warm milk was successfully delivered to Icarus.
Hmm, what's this? Dalphs wanted you to deliver this glass of warm milk to me? Oh, so it's supposed to help me fall asleep after I drink it. I'm crossing my fingers!

I really hope so. I don't know why I can't fall asleep on Christmas Eve. Maybe I'm too excited about it! I was really sad the past two years since I didn't get anything from Santa Claus, but now that you've told me about it I can finally go to bed. Thanks! Santa Claus will come visit me this time, right? Please thank Dalphs for me.
Any unfinished business in this town? Okay, please make sure to extend my thanks to Dalphs.
I can see that you have successfully given him the milk. He should be in la-la land by now. Good job! I would like to reward you for what you've done.
Here, take this recommendation to the Christmas Tree and something nice will happen to you. Have a great holiday! Merry Christmas!
You haven't met Dalphs#b#p9220005##k yet. Please tell him I said "thank you."
You have to get Icarus#b#p1052106##k a glass of warm milk soon or Santa Claus will just pass his house like he did last year!
